CustomField.description: This flag indicates whether sending product tax code to the tax provider service or not. If it is set to true make sure every product has a tax code configured otherwise default product tax code will be used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This flag indicates whether sending product tax code to the tax provider service or not. If it is set to true make sure every product has a tax code configured otherwise default product tax code will be used.
CustomField.label: Consider product tax codes?
